HOME.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Discover the modules that perfectly match your study direction and interests.
HOME.HERO_ECTS_INFO: Each module is {{ects}} ECTS and runs for one period.
HOME.HERO_ECTS_DEFAULT: Each module is 5 ECTS and runs for one period.
HOME.WHY_DESCRIPTION: We help you find the perfect elective module that matches your ambitions

RECOMMENDATIONS.TITLE: AI Recommendations
RECOMMENDATIONS.SUBTITLE: Get personalized module recommendations based on your interests
RECOMMENDATIONS.INPUT_DESC: Describe your interests, preferences, and what you want to learn. The more details, the better the recommendations!
RECOMMENDATIONS.INPUT_PLACEHOLDER: For example: I'm interested in web development, artificial intelligence and data science. I would like to learn more about machine learning and modern frontend frameworks...
